eng:sai: Woe to every scorner and mocker
ban: প্রত্যেক পশ্চাতে ও সম্মুখে পরনিন্দাকারীর দুর্ভোগ,

eng:sai: Who collects wealth and [continuously] counts it.
eng:arb: who has gathered riches and counted them over
ban: যে অর্থ সঞ্চিত করে ও গণনা করে

eng:sai: He thinks that his wealth will make him immortal.
eng:arb: thinking his riches have made him immortal!
ban: সে মনে করে যে, তার অর্থ চিরকাল তার সাথে থাকবে!

eng:sai: No! He will surely be thrown into the Crusher.
eng:arb: No indeed; he shall be thrust into the Crusher;
ban: কখনও না, সে অবশ্যই নিক্ষিপ্ত হবে পিষ্টকারীর মধ্যে।

eng:sai: And what can make you know what is the Crusher?
eng:arb: and what shall teach thee what is the Crusher;

eng:sai: It is the fire of Allah, [eternally] fueled,
Which mounts directed at the hearts.
Indeed, Hellfire will be closed down upon them
